Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the governance of the Westchester county health care corporation
Summary: Relates to the governance of the Westchester county health care corporation to twenty-one voting directors and provides for the appointment of such members.
LawCode: Amd ยง3303, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the Westchester county health care corporation
